attributes.action: To disallow a non Muslim community (Ahmedi) changing the last Prophet in Islam.
attributes.additional_details: We want the Government to acknowledge the interest of the public by disallowing any false propositions that there is another final Prophet in Islam other than Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon Him). Also, to safeguard and defend the respect of Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon Him) as the final Prophet and most importantly for Islam not to be altered as a religion.
attributes.background: We urge for the fundamental beliefs of Islam to be honoured, one of them being that Prophet Muhammad is the final Prophet. Currently, a group of people referred as the ‘Ahmedi’s’ are legally trying to alter the final Prophet as someone other than Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon Him) in Islam.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for deciding on religious beliefs or practices.
